name: Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
descr:
[h2]The Legendary RPG Returns[/h2]Originally released in 2000, Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition is the legendary Dungeons & Dragons RPG— freshly updated for modern adventurers. 

Customize a party of up to six heroes and venture across the icy tundra to battle monsters, plunder dungeons, and uncover secrets of the frozen wastes.[h2]Original Campaigns & Unseen Quests[/h2]The Enhanced Edition includes the classic campaign, two official expansions, plus quests cut from the original 2000 release.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/321800/extras/IWD-Background-600.jpg?t=1618856688[/img]
[list][li]Original Icewind Dale Campaign
[/li][li]Heart of Winter Expansion
[/li][li]Trials of the Luremaster Expansion
[/li][li]Quest content cut from the Original Game[/li][/list][h2]Customize Your Party[/h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/321800/extras/IWD_Portraits-600.jpg?t=1618856688[/img]
[list][li]30+ New Character Kits & Adventuring Classes
[/li][li]Upload characters from previous playthroughs
[/li][li]Dozens of new Spells & Gear for your Heroes
[/li][li]New Magical Armor and Weaponry[/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/321800/extras/IWD-Portraits-600.jpg?t=1618856688[/img][h2]Classic Gameplay[/h2][list][li]2-D isometric graphics
[/li][li]Real-time-with-pause combat
[/li][li]Adapts 2nd Edition Dungeons & Dragons Rules[/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/321800/extras/IWD_Museum2-600.jpg?t=1618856688[/img][h2]Enhanced for Modern Adventurers[/h2][list][li]Updated Interface and New Quick-loot Bar
[/li][li]Upgrades the original with scores of bug fixes
[/li][li]Cross-platform Multiplayer for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android & iOS[/li][/list][h2]Evil Stirs in the Frozen North[/h2]In the northernmost reaches of the Forgotten Realms lies the region of icy tundra known as Icewind Dale. Journey deep into the Spine of the World, a harsh and unforgiving territory settled only by the hardiest folk. Encounter fearsome beasts that have learned the cunning ferocity needed to survive among the snow-shrouded peaks. Confront an evil that schemes beneath the carven glaciers to wreak destruction upon the face of Faerun. This is the world of Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition!
